inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: hepatitis C Virus related liver cirrhosis child A& B (scores 5-9)

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: chronic inflammation compatible with a chronic viral hepatitis

exclusion.criterion: HCV coinfection with HBV or HIV
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with high risk of infection (I.V drug users, patients with blood disease requiring blood transfusion)
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no evidence of I.V drug use or blood disease

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy. Recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma.
